docs.title: Climate and Disaster Resilience Pilots
docs.text: Welcome to the project webpage! Use the navigation panel to explore.

docs.title: Datasets
docs.text: The virtual assistant leverages the following datasets: - ECMWF Climate Data Store (CDS) - Green Deal Data Space - Copernicus Atmosphere Monitoring Service (CAMS) - WEkEO Environmental Data Hub

docs.title: Future Directions
docs.text: We plan to enhance the assistant by: - Adding reasoning capabilities. - Implementing visualization tools for scientific output. - Extending support to more OGC standards.

docs.title: Methodology
docs.text: Steps to implement the project: 1. Data curation and integration. 2. Assistant development for NLP-enabled querying. 3. Incorporation of Open Geospatial standards.

docs.title: Objectives
docs.text: Our project aims to: - Build a Generative AI-enabled virtual assistant. - Enhance data discoverability using NLP and structured APIs. - Integrate workflows with OGC standards.
